mods:titleInfo.mods:title: [Dedication of Sepúlveda Park Fountain, San Pedro]

mods:physicalDescription.mods:extent: 1 photographic print : b&w ; 13 x 18 cm

mods:mods.mods:note: In ms. on verso: 1924, dedication of Sepúlveda Park Fountain (in background) at San Pedro. While almost everyone in picture is related somehow, I will only identify those seated. L.R. On ground (in front of bench): First three girls children of Albert Sepúlveda (Nadine, Alberta and Marjorie); next unknown; Patricia, dau. of Benjamin Sepúlveda; Louis and Roman Contos (sons of Modesta S. Contos); Elenita Sepúlveda (dau. of Philip); Gloria M. Shearer (dau. of Carolina S. Shearer). Seated: Philip Sepúlveda; Carolina Sepúlveda Shearer; William Sepúlveda; Albert Sepúlveda; Roman and Caroline Sepúlveda; Louis M. Sepúlveda; Elenita Sepúlveda Snyder; Benjamin Sepúlveda; Modesta Sepúlveda Contos

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: [Dedication of Sepúlveda Park Fountain, San Pedro]
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: 1 photographic print : b&w ; 13 x 18 cm
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In ms. on verso: 1924, dedication of Sepúlveda Park Fountain (in background) at San Pedro. While almost everyone in picture is related somehow, I will only identify those seated. L.R. On ground (in front of bench): First three girls children of Albert Sepúlveda (Nadine, Alberta and Marjorie); next unknown; Patricia, dau. of Benjamin Sepúlveda; Louis and Roman Contos (sons of Modesta S. Contos); Elenita Sepúlveda (dau. of Philip); Gloria M. Shearer (dau. of Carolina S. Shearer). Seated: Philip Sepúlveda; Carolina Sepúlveda Shearer; William Sepúlveda; Albert Sepúlveda; Roman and Caroline Sepúlveda; Louis M. Sepúlveda; Elenita Sepúlveda Snyder; Benjamin Sepúlveda; Modesta Sepúlveda Contos
